attributes.action: Re nationalize the railways and bus services and make their use free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to get motorists off the road and out of their cars, all railway and bus services should be run by the government as non profit making organisations and be free of charge at the point of useage to all british citizens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
